messages.subject: homeschooling book party
messages.msgSnippet: For the Washingtonians on this list (or any visitors heading up my way!) You are all invited to a book party to celebrate publication of my new book
messages.messageBody:
For the Washingtonians on this list (or any visitors heading up my
way!)

You are all invited to a book party to celebrate publication of my
new book "Homeschooling and the Voyage of Self-Discovery", and two
storytelling books "The Healing Heart~Families" and "The Healing
Heart~Communities."

It will take place Saturday evening, April 19th, at the Friends
Meeting House, 219 B Street, Tumwater. There will be some
storytelling (3 tellers, I think), a display of the cover art from
the book cover contest -- we received submissions from as far away as
Natal, South Africa, and Kuala Lampur, Malaysia, and of course books
for sale. (you can see the finalists on my website at
www.skylarksings.com)

Dessert potluck -- bring your favorite. Kids invited of course
(someone's gotta eat!)

If you need more info., call me at 360 352-0506, or send me an e-mail.

david
www.skylarksings.com
